title: How to migrate to the cloud properly
body_markdown:
According to Rackspace, 88% of companies reduced costs thanks to running services in the cloud. The key benefits of cloud migration are:

1. reduced costs
2. improved system resilience
3. faster disaster recovery
4. higher flexibility
5. scalable data storage

Here is [an ultimate guide to a successful cloud migration](https://dev.to/smartym/an-ultimate-guide-to-successful-cloud-migration-402h).

According to Rackspace, 88% of companies reduced costs thanks to running services in the cloud. The key benefits of cloud migration are:

  2. improved system resilience
  3. faster disaster recovery

title: DeveloperHabits - a YT channel for devs about habits and growth mindset
body_markdown:
During my career, I've experienced failure and success, many times. I know that Learning to code and constantly keeping one up-to-date is hard. That said, by building a strong foundation of habits and mindset, success is inevitable. 

To help myself and others grow, [DeveloperHabits](https://youtu.be/iV7vfdiHBjs) was created. If you like my articles, you'll definitely like the channel!
